amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to add flexibility in Section 120 so that future projects can also qualify for the pilot program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce (CA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Royce (CA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Royce (CA) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
